kv19.8:3.1: ☑ Atthi lokiyo mano, atthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:3.3: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, atthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:3.5: atthi lokiyo mano, atthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:3.7: Atthi lokiyā paññā, atthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:4.1: ☑ Atthi lokiyaṃ somanassaṃ, atthi lokiyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ …pe…
kv19.8:4.2: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:4.4: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, atthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:4.6: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:4.8: Atthi lokiyā paññā, atthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:5.1: ☑ Atthi lokiyā saddhā, natthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:5.3: Atthi lokiyo mano, natthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:5.5: atthi lokiyā paññā, natthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:5.7: Atthi lokiyo mano, natthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:6.1: ☑ Atthi lokiyā saddhā, natthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:6.3: Atthi lokiyaṃ somanassaṃ, natthi lokiyaṃ somanassindriyanti …
kv19.8:6.4: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, natthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:6.6: atthi lokiyā paññā, natthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:6.8: Atthi lokiyo mano, natthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti …pe…
kv19.8:6.9: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, natthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:7.1: ☑ Atthi lokuttarā saddhā, atthi lokuttaraṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:7.3: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, atthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:7.6: atthi lokuttarā paññā, atthi lokuttaraṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:7.8: Atthi lokiyā paññā, atthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.1: ☑ Atthi lokiyā saddhā, natthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.3: Atthi lokuttarā saddhā, natthi lokuttaraṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.6: atthi lokiyā paññā, natthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.8: Atthi lokuttarā paññā, natthi lokuttaraṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:9.4: “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye, svākāre, suviññāpaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvino viharante”ti.
kv19.8:10.1: Atīte kilese jahati anāgate kilese jahati paccuppanne kilese jahati,
